game.name: News Tower
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam Cloud, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Develop your newspaper and become New York’s new media mogul! In this tycoon, build and manage your newspaper from printer to toilet. Create your editorial line and lead your journalists through unique 1930's stories and dig out the latest scoops!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Develop your newspaper and become New York’s new media mogul! In this tycoon, build and manage your newspaper from printer to toilet. Create your editorial line and lead your journalists through unique 1930's stories and dig out the latest scoops!

reviewHighlights.text: 진짜 재미있어요. 물론 한국어가 지원 안돼서 아쉽긴 하지만, 배경음악도 옛날 뉴욕의 재즈 느낌 나고, 또 그래픽도 아르 데코 느낌이 많이 나서 이거 취향이신 분들은 재밌게 플레이하실 수 있을 것 같네요.
